parameters: \.\C[4](I can't see the parts hidden under clothes,

it feels awkward to just leave it here...)
\.\C[3]I placed the Kanna doll in a discreet spot.
Like I'm looking into a mirror!)
\."Oof... Our enemy's got some wild hobbies, huh."
\.\C[3]Yet I can't look away from that intricateness.
without a lot of long, detailed observation.)
\."Keiji, I want to know your perspective...
What do you think about Kai?"
\."Do you think he's a bad person...?"
\."Everybody's got good parts and bad parts, right?"
\."...Look, you just do what you can, Sara.
For now, we'll take this doll along."
\."Keiji, I want to know your perspective...
Is there someone who has your attention?"
Want to take this doll along?"
\C[3]A card with Keymaster written on it.
It reads: "This is a key to the exit.
You will die if someone learns of this card."
A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.
\C[3]A stopper at the bottom of the bath. Small and heavy.
